meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the form of flat ribbons
meanings.sent1: I love the way fettuccine looks on my plate.
meanings.sent2: Mom cooked delicious fettuccine for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The fettuccine danced in the boiling water.
meanings.sent4: The fettuccine ribbon wrapped around the fork like a present.
meanings.sent5: The fettuccine's flat ribbons are perfect for soaking up sauce.

meanings.definition: A dish made with fettuccine pasta, typically served with a creamy sauce
meanings.sent1: My favorite dish at the restaurant is the fettuccine with creamy sauce.
meanings.sent2: She ordered fettuccine alfredo for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The fettuccine and sauce hugged each other in the bowl.
meanings.sent4: The creamy sauce whispered secrets to the fettuccine.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the fettuccine dish filled the room with warmth.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare fettuccine pasta
meanings.sent1: I will fettuccine the pasta for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She fettuccines the noodles perfectly every time.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally fettuccined the pasta for too long.
meanings.sent4: The chef fettuccined the dish with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: Fettuccining pasta requires attention to timing and texture.
